description:
When solving a problem, generate and visualize 2-3 alternative solution approaches side-by-side. Shows different strategies (e.g., algebraic vs. graphical, brute-force vs. optimized) with trade-off analysis.

**Rationale:** Exposing multiple solution strategies teaches flexible thinking and problem-solving patterns. Students learn when to apply different approaches and understand there's often more than one valid path to an answer.
title: Solution Path Comparison Visualizer
